column17:
Product Description

Lass Herbal Henna Hair Powder contains Amla (Indian Gooseberry) Bhringraj (Eclipta Alba) Barhami (Centella Asiatica) Shikakai (Acacia Concinna) and Neem (Azadirachta Indica). All these herbs are excellent natural hair tonic fungicidal and anti-bacterial. Regular usage prevents your scalp from diseases keeps hair healthy and full of shine. Lass Herbal Henna Hair Powder acts as a hair vitalizer and promotes hair growth. It conditions hair and takes care of majority of scalp disorders. Regular use provides strength and shine to the hair. - Natural hair conditioner. Gives a natural shine & luster to hair - Nourishes and prevents premature graying of hair. - Natural & pure. Contains no chemicals dyes or impurities. - Authentic Ayurveda. Natural Product. No Animal Testing. Affordable priced and honestly marketed SLS PARABEN & PHTHALATES FREE Ingredients : Henna (Lawsonia Inermis Linn) Indian Gooseberry or Aamla (Emblica Officinalis Gartn) Bhringraj (Eclipta Alba) Barhami (Centella Asiatica) Harad (Triminalia Chebula) Behada (Terminalia Bellirica Roxb.)
